body:
It seems like this depends on the network condition as I first noticed this while on a plane, and it happens to me every so often but never on travis. Offenders are TestSyncNodeStatusDeletePods and TestSyncNodeStatusTransitionTime. This may be reproducible by disconnecting network connection but also happens sometimes while connected.

```
➜  kubernetes git:(master) make test WHAT=pkg/cloudprovider/controller GOFLAGS='-v -test.run="SyncNodeStatusDeletePods|SyncNodeStatusTransitionTime"'
hack/test-go.sh pkg/cloudprovider/controller 
+++ Running unit tests without code coverage
=== RUN TestSyncNodeStatusTransitionTime
E0303 12:08:17.296166   69206 nodecontroller.go:285] Can't get ip address of node node0: lookup node0: no such host
E0303 12:08:27.302063   69206 nodecontroller.go:285] Can't get ip address of node node0: lookup node0: no such host
--- PASS: TestSyncNodeStatusTransitionTime (35.03s)
=== RUN TestSyncNodeStatusDeletePods
E0303 12:08:37.312822   69206 nodecontroller.go:285] Can't get ip address of node node0: lookup node0: no such host
E0303 12:08:52.329344   69206 nodecontroller.go:285] Can't get ip address of node node0: lookup node0: no such host
E0303 12:09:02.341824   69206 nodecontroller.go:285] Can't get ip address of node node0: lookup node0: no such host
E0303 12:09:17.360914   69206 nodecontroller.go:285] Can't get ip address of node node0: lookup node0: no such host
--- PASS: TestSyncNodeStatusDeletePods (50.06s)
PASS
ok      github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/cloudprovider/controller  85.098s
```

nodecontroller.go:285 is a call to net.LookupIP(), I'll investigate more.

labels.description: Lowest priority. Possibly useful, but not yet enough support to actually get it done.
labels.name: priority/awaiting-more-evidence

title: Unit tests in pkg/cloudprovider/controller take 90 seconds when not connected to network
